instruction_step2: Connect the robot using the cable or the dongle.
instruction_step4: Click on the button To search for robots.
instruction_step5: Select your robot in the list.
consigne_training_title: You will now train the robot
record_sound: Record a Sound with the microphone, or play it on the piano
select_action: Select an action that you will map to that sound + sensor input
repeat_training: Repeat until you have trained every action you wanted
choose_training_mode: First, choose if you want to train the robot using the sensors + microphone or only the microphone.
train_instruction_1: You will now train the robot
train_instruction_2: Record a Sound with the microphone, or play it on the piano
train_instruction_3: Select an action that you will map to that sound + sensor input
train_instruction_4: Repeat until you have trained every action you wanted
train_instruction_5: First, choose if you want to train the robot using the sensors + microphone or only the microphone.
testing_instructions_title: The computer will now prepare the model
testing_instruction_step1: Click the button below to start training
testing_instruction_step2: Observe the training of the neural network
Model_ready: The model is now ready, click to test it!
tooltip_get_robots: Click on this button to find connected robots
tooltip_select_robot: Click here to choose this robot.
tooltip_use_captors_and_note: This mode uses the 9 proximity sensors and the microphone.
tooltip_use_note_only: This mode uses only the microphone.
tooltip_start_recording: Click here to record a sound (allow the microphone access to your computer).
tooltip_piano: If you don't have an instrument, or can't make noise, use the piano to record a note.
piano-component-train: If you don't have an instrument, or can't make noise, use the piano to record a note.
tooltip_thymio_svg: This diagram turns red the sensors of Thymio that detect something.
tooltip_musical_staff: After recording a sound or playing a note on the piano, it will appear here.
tooltip_go_to_map_action: After recording the note and activating the sensors you want, click here to proceed.
tooltip_map_actions: Click on the action for which you want to assign the previously recorded note (and sensor combination).
tooltip_action_column: Here you can see which action has been selected,
tooltip_captors_column: For this specific state of the sensors,
tooltip_note_column: And when Thymio hears this note.
tooltip_map_more_actions: Click here if you want to teach Thymio more actions.
tooltip_save_model: Click here to save the model, so you can use it later.
tooltip_test_model: Click here if you are done training.
tooltip_execute: Click this button to test your model. Thymio will start listening and react according to the heard note.
tooltip_toggle_recording_musical_staff: This button turns on/off Thymio's listening.
tooltip_bar_chart: This graph shows which actions are most likely for Thymio to undertake, based on the current state of its sensors and the note it is currently hearing.
tooltip_load_model: Click here to load an existing model.
tooltip_visualize_nn: Click here to visualize the neural network.
tooltip_stop_testing: Click here to stop the execution, Thymio will stop.
tooltip_switch_decision: This button toggles between two modes: Winner takes all = the most probable action is always chosen, or probabilistic decision = actions are chosen proportionally to their probability.
mic_error: Access to the microphone failed or has been denied by the user
no_training_data: No training data available. Please provide at least one training example before testing.
